data.Name: Zoso
data.Bio: In 1995, Zoso was formed to create the most mesmerizing and accurate portrayal of "the biggest band of the 1970â€™s" - Led Zeppelin (Rolling Stone Magazine). Each member was selected to portray both the appearance and playing styles of Robert Plant, Jimmy Page, John Bonham, and John Paul Jones. Zoso almost immediately developed an outstanding regional reputation and were awarded "Best Tribute Act in California" by Rock City News. In 1999, Zoso began touring nationally Read more on Last.fm
